channel.title: Studio: If It Ain't Broke, Add a Breakpoint! :: Java Web Development
channel.description: The purpose of this studio is to expand your current debugging strategies. First, as a group, you will discuss your current debugging strategies. Next, you will explore the debugger tools addressed in this chapter. This studio will use a previous studio assignment to explore IntelliJâ€™s Debugger. On your machine, open up your copy of java-web-dev-projects in IntelliJ and navigate to the project for the interfaces studio. Part One: Pre-Debugger Debugging Share with the group one error you encountered when working on your version of the interfaces studio.
